head.title: Remove {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to remove specific pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Effortlessly process PDFs, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Remove pages from {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} apps with powerful document processing features, including page removal from {{FileFormatUp}} files.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a feature-rich document processing tool that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It offers merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and deleting pages to streamline document management in your applications.

more_features.title: Advanced document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a complete set of tools for working with over 50 widely used file formats, making document processing easier and more efficient.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and archives with customizable merging options for precise results.

feature_2.title: Flexible page management
feature_2.content: Rearrange document pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to keep your files well-organized.

feature_3.title: Customize page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between landscape and portrait orientation.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate files
feature_4.content: Select and save specific pages as standalone documents.

formats.title: Remove pages from various document formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, allowing you to modify documents quickly and effortlessly.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Discover additional capabilities of our document processing solution.

examples.comment_1: Create a {{NameProduct}} instance and provide the file path
examples.comment_2: Define the page number(s) to be removed

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to delete pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Integrate it into your {{EnvName}} applications to enhance document management capabilities.
content.step_1: Specify the path to the {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_2: Set the page numbers you want to remove.

code_1.title: Remove all even-numbered pages
code_1.content: Learn how to delete even-numbered pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Provide the file path to the constructor
code_1.comment_2: Get the total number of pages in the document
code_1.comment_3: Configure settings to remove even pages
code_1.comment_5: Save the updated file to the specified location
